net.majorkernelpanic.spydroid.api
Class CustomHttpServer

java.lang.Object
  net.majorkernelpanic.http.BasicHttpServer
      net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.misc.HttpServer
          net.majorkernelpanic.spydroid.api.CustomHttpServer

public class CustomHttpServer
extends HttpServer

HTTP server of Spydroid Its document root is assets/www, it contains a little user-friendly website to control spydroid from a browser The default behavior of HttpServer is enhanced with a RequestHandler
